title: Cosmic Reaver Kassadin

embed.description: A lot of you have raised your concerns in the comment section about Cosmic Reaver Kassadin. Let me highlight some Summoners comments in case you didn't have a chance to read them. Of course you can read a whole lot more here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/galaxies-crumble-cosmic-reaver-kassadin ---- > Alright, I don't comment much but I feel the need to let my frustrations be known.

body:
Well, to begin with, the link is about boycotting the skin. Do I agree it should be done? Yes I do. I'm here to try and get people to join in, but before you jump on me about it and get angry, just take a moment to listen to why I'm so pissed off at Riot for doing this.

We're getting the shitty end of the bargain. Other servers got their server skin for free, why shouldn't we get ours? On top of that they got more than one, so the excuse that Riot already gave us a free skin is invalid.

"But it's for charity!" I hear you cry. Yes. I would also pay for Pulsefire Ezreal if it were going to charity. But this? This is supposed to be the skin that says "I'm in OCE!", not the skin that says "I gave money to charity because I have money to burn on a game!". It's a glorified excuse, and nothing more. Riot is just hiding behind a righteous facade, and I don't like it. I support the charity, but not all the money will go to it. Remember, you will pay for an amount of RP, but only a portion of that amount will be donated to the charity (proportional to the amount of RP paid for the skin). In the end we're getting ripped off, and they're going to profit from it overall.

If they make this skin free, I'd gladly buy another skin, even if it is more expensive, to give to charity. But no, that's not how it is. Sorry Riot, I'm not take this scam.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/50FixXhb-boycotting-cosmic-reaver-kassadin

replies.body: What a well reasoned and sensible response. Do you work for Riot by any chance?
My opinion is pretty damn similar to yours. +1
